H0.text: In which book of the bible is the story of Samson and Delilah. Genesis

H1.text: In which book of the bible is the story of Samson and Delilah. Exodus

H2.text: In which book of the bible is the story of Samson and Delilah. Leviticus

H3.text: In which book of the bible is the story of Samson and Delilah. Judges

A4.text: Delilah is mentioned in the sixteenth chapter of the Book of Judges in the Hebrew Bible.

A5.text: The Bible says that Samson loved her (Judges 16:4).
